findings.title: QSP-3 Gas Usage / for Loop Concerns
findings.description: In `LiquidityPoolModule` depending on the number of `perpetuals`, `setAllPerpetualsToEmergencyState` and `addLiquidity` can consume excessive gas.

findings.title: Typo: liquidit -> liquidity
findings.description: A typo exists in the code where 'liquidit' is used instead of 'liquidity'.

findings.title: initialize -> initialize
findings.description: In LiquidityPoolModule.sol, initialize function should validate insuranceFundCap >= 0 using at the minimum as a negative cap does not seem to have meaning.

findings.title: vaersionKey -> versionKey
findings.description: Grammatically wrong message in require statement.

findings.title: vesion -> version
findings.description: Grammatically incorrect message in require statement.

findings.title: Typo in Contract Status Declaration
findings.description: The Governance contract incorrectly declares itself as 'termainated' instead of 'terminated'.

findings.title: Malformed Input Data
findings.description: The input data can be malformed, leading to potential security issues.
